task_description: Facing the building to your North-East (approx. 33°), estimate the height of the main building in front of you in meters. Answer with one number and a short rationale.

reason: The top of the target building is cut off in the current view, so I need to look up to see its full height before I can make an estimation.
Now that I can see the entire building, which appears to be 8 stories high, I will estimate its height by assuming a standard floor height of 3.5 meters and then stop.
